alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:27PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 915 PM MST... At 827 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Claypool to 6 miles west of Miami to near Top-Of-The-World to 9 miles north of Kearny to 6 miles northwest of Christmas. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, Superior, Miami, Central Heights-Midland City, Boyce Thompson Arboretum, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 222 and 252, and near mile marker 260. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 150 and 165. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 159 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin
